page.title: 04HORSES, SOMERFORD AREA
page.content: A lot of people in the area own horses It is very interesting because there are a lot of sanderinas and bridlepaths about.Sanderinas are indoor riding schools with sawdust or woodshavings on the ground.They are used for practising jumping,dressage and gymkhana.There are also quite a few stables which people visit to ride.Local shows are very popular and so is hunting.A lot of fields are used for horses.The river is also used for hunter trials as an obstacle.Dauntsey horse trials are the most well known of all the local events. Also in the area is a stud farm. A stud farm is the proper name for breeding stables. There is a famous stallion there called Michaelangelo. Lots of people bring their mares to breed from him.
